messages.subject: great find at Barnes & Noble
messages.msgSnippet: If any of you are in need of a good dictionary (my kids are always wondering what words mean), B&N stores (not the dotcom) have a huge Webster s Unabridged
messages.messageBody:
If any of you are in need of a good dictionary (my kids are always wondering what words mean), B&N stores (not the dotcom) have a huge Webster's Unabridged dictionary in their bargain section right now. The copyright on it is 1996, but I don't think that makes it any less worthwhile. Retail on it is $100.... it is marked $29.95. With my discount card, it was only $21.18 including tax. I am guessing this is chain-wide, since a neighbor bought one at a different B&N than the one I went to today. Mine had several copies.

Karen
Mama to Emily (12/91), Noah (12/95), Halle (10/98), and Joel (9/00)
http://www.geocities.com/heartland/2358
